AnDO_engine module¶

AnDO_engine.flatten(seq)¶

Format list the proper way exemple: [[x],[y],[z]]—>[x,y,z]

Parameters:seq – list to format
AnDO_engine.get_regular_expressions(fileName)¶

https://github.com/bids-standard/bids-validator/tree/master/bids-validator/

using function to read regex in rule files

AnDO_engine.is_AnDO(names)¶

Check if file path adheres to AnDO. Main method of the validator. uses other class methods for checking different aspects of the directory path.

Parameters:names –
AnDO_engine.is_AnDO_verbose(names)¶

Check if file path adheres to AnDO. Main method of the validator. uses other class methods for checking different aspects of the directory path.

Parameters:names – list of names founds in the path
AnDO_engine.is_session(names)¶

Check names follows session rules

Parameters:names – list of names founds in the path
AnDO_engine.is_source(names)¶

Check names follows source rules

Parameters:names – list of names founds in the path
AnDO_engine.is_subject(names)¶

Check names follows subject rules

Parameters:names – list of names founds in the path
